## TinySynq class

The main class for managing SQLite3 synchronisation.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class TinySynq 
```

## Remarks

Expects SQLite3 version &gt;<!-- -->=3.45.1

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(opts)](./tinysynq-web.tinysynq._constructor_.md) |  | Configure new TinySynq instance. |

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [db](./tinysynq-web.tinysynq.db.md) | <code>readonly</code> | any | SQLiteWASM instance (See [SQLite Wasm](https://github.com/sqlite/sqlite-wasm)<!-- -->) |
|  [dbPath](./tinysynq-web.tinysynq.dbpath.md) | <code>readonly</code> | string | Path to DB file |
|  [deviceId](./tinysynq-web.tinysynq.deviceid.md) | <code>readonly</code> | string \| undefined | Automatically generated ID for device's DB instance. |
|  [synqBatchSize](./tinysynq-web.tinysynq.synqbatchsize.md) | <code>readonly</code> | number | Number of records to process in each batch when syncing changes. |
|  [synqDbId](./tinysynq-web.tinysynq.synqdbid.md) | <code>readonly</code> | string \| undefined | Alias for [TinySynq.deviceId](./tinysynq-web.tinysynq.deviceid.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [synqPrefix](./tinysynq-web.tinysynq.synqprefix.md) | <code>readonly</code> | string \| undefined | The prefix used for TinySynq's tables. |
|  [synqTables](./tinysynq-web.tinysynq.synqtables.md) | <code>readonly</code> | Record&lt;string, [SyncableTable](./tinysynq-web.syncabletable.md)<!-- -->&gt; \| undefined | Object containing [SyncableTable](./tinysynq-web.syncabletable.md)<!-- -->s, keyed by table name. |
|  [utils](./tinysynq-web.tinysynq.utils.md) | <code>readonly</code> | Utils | <p>Basic Helpers.</p><p> move to a separate file.</p> |
|  [wal](./tinysynq-web.tinysynq.wal.md) | <code>readonly</code> | boolean | Enable or disable WAL mode. |

|  [getLastSync()](./tinysynq-web.tinysynq.getlastsync.md) |  | Returns an ISO8601 formatted date and time of the last successful local sync. |
|  [getNewId()](./tinysynq-web.tinysynq.getnewid.md) |  | Get a random 16-character ID generated by nanoid |
|  [getPending()](./tinysynq-web.tinysynq.getpending.md) |  | Returns changes that couldn't be applied yet because they were received out of sequence. |
|  [getRecordMeta(params)](./tinysynq-web.tinysynq.getrecordmeta.md) |  | Get associated meta data (including <code>vclock</code>) for record. |
